welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Villaviciosa de Odon, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. We hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The original terminal at Barajas Airport, now used mainly for low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Barajas Airport, used for some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The most modern and technologically advanced terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.
